Material used.Description: Cells were transfected with cDNA containing the PINK1 variant or a control vector.

Readout description.Result Description: PINK1 protein expression level was reduced compared to control cells.  Localization of the protein also appeared affected, displaying a more diffuse pattern.

Technical replicates.Description: Not described in the provided text.

Basic positive control.Description: Cells transfected with wild-type PINK1 cDNA served as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells transfected with empty vector served as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Not described in the provided text.  Normal PINK1 expression and mitochondrial localization are expected.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Reduced protein expression and altered mitochondrial localization.
